name: Sometime I want wo stay alone
name_original: Sometime I want wo stay alone
description:
Idea comes from a short video on Weibo called Star (https://weibointl.api.weibo.cn/share/202030206.html?weibo_id=4587602215444256). I really love this short animation and music so I made this game. 

Just want to show you how colorful our own world is.
